snippet: A post-earthquake housing program in Haiti financed by the United States Agency for International Development has delivered only a quarter of the planned number of houses.
abstract: Government audit reveals that post-earthquake housing program in Haiti financed by the United States Agency for International Development has delivered only a quarter of the planned number of houses at nearly twice the estimated cost.
lead_paragraph: A post-earthquake housing program in Haiti financed by the United States Agency for International Development has delivered only a quarter of the planned number of houses.

headline.main: Haiti: Housing Effort Said to Lag
headline.print_headline: Haiti: Housing Effort Said to Lag

keywords.value: United States Agency for International Development
keywords.name: organizations
